```bash
$ poetry install
$ poetry run classroom-pilot documented-feature
```

- [ ] Clear for target audience
- [ ] Logical progression

- [ ] Addresses common questions

- [ ] Content accuracy verified
- [ ] Style guide compliance
- [ ] Technical review approved
